title: Mercury Transit in the 4th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 4th house for Scorpio Ascendant, attention turns to home, emotional security, and practical decision-making related to family and property. The mind becomes analytical about domestic matters, leading to planning, discussions, and reorganization at home. Communication within the family increases, though overthinking can disturb inner peace. Property or vehicle-related decisions require careful evaluation. When used consciously, this transit supports clear domestic communication, rational emotional handling, and smart planning for long-term security.
